snippet: Hugo Chávez was the world’s leading Socialist on social media, with over four million followers on Twitter.
abstract: News analysis; late Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez embraced social media in way that few world leaders have with over four million followers on Twitter; numeric catalog of Twitter-related Chavez data provided.

byline.original: By MARC LAVALLEE and ALEXIS MAINLAND

lead_paragraph: Hugo Chávez was the world’s leading Socialist on social media, with over four million followers on Twitter.
